content: उच्छिष्ट {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Left as a remainder {@--2@} Rejected, abandoned; अन्° <ls>R. 12. 15.</ls> {@--3@} Stale; °कल्पना stale idea or invention. {@--4@} (Used actively) One who has not washed his mouth and hands after meals, and hence considered impure; न चोच्छिष्टः क्वचिद् व्रजेत् <ls>Ms. 2. 56.</ls> --ष्टं {@--1@} Leavings, fragments, remainder (especially of food or sacrifice); नोच्छिष्टं कस्यचिद् दद्यात् <ls>Ms. 2. 56</ls>; so द्विज°, गृध्र°. {@--2@} Honey.
